system.description:
You have learned to draw upon the power of your bonded artifact to aid in your own creations. You gain the following benefits:

  • When one of your spell inventions would fizzle, you can spend artifact charges sufficient to cast the level of spell it contains. The spell invention does nothing this turn, but does not stop working and can be used normally without needing to be repaired.
  • When you use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2syblzgm6at7i7q]{Tactical Chemistry}, you can spend an artifact charge to stabilize the item for a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus before it loses potency.
  • Half of your artificer levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of gaining access to the Extra Attack and Spellsword features.
